rules.name: Replace Oracle delegate class for Quartz with PostgreSql delegate class
rules.description: Replace Oracle specific JobStore delegate which is OracleDelegate with PostgreSQL JobStore delegate PostgreSQLDelegate

rules.name: Replace Oracle Database driver with PostgreSQL Database driver
rules.description: Replace oracle jdbc driver oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver with PostgreSQL jdbc driver org.postgresql.Driver

rules.name: Oracle specific implementation of connection cache and connection pooling
rules.description: Replace oracle specific pool classes with PostgreSQL specific classes from org.postgresql.ds

rules.description: Replace oracle specific pool classes with PostgreSQL specific classes from org.postgresql.ds
